description: HTML file that contains embedded JavaScript defining a Calculator class extending Service, including method registration and service management logic.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A service class extending Service that implements add and sub methods for basic calculations.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Performs addition on array of parameters, returning a Promise resolved with the sum.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Performs subtraction of two parameters, returning a Promise resolved with the difference.
